newsitem.title: USA: Hilton says Circus talk is untrue.
newsitem.headline: Hilton says Circus talk is untrue.

text.p: A Hilton Hotels Corp spokesman Friday said speculation that it may be interested in acquiring Circus Circus Enterprises Inc is not true.
Responding to a story in this week's Business Week magazine, Hilton's Senior Vice President of Corporate Affairs Marc Grossman said "there is no truth to that rumor."

The magazine cites unnamed money managers as saying Beverly Hills-based Hilton, one of the nation's largest hotel and gambling companies, is considering making a run at Circus, another major player in the gambling industry. Hilton shares were off 9/16 at 31-7/8. Circus was up 12/16 at 24-11/16.
